gradle/org.gradle.language.nativeplatform/DependentSourceSet

DependentSourceSet

@Incubating
interface DependentSourceSet : LanguageSourceSet(source)

A source set that depends on one or more org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeDependencySets to be built.
